courses.customDesc: One course from each of the following GE areas must be completed: A1, A2, A3, B2, Upper-Division B, C1, C2, Lower-Division C Elective, Upper-Division C, D1, D2, D2, Upper-Division D, E, and GE Elective. Upper-Division B, Upper-Division C, and Upper-Division D should be taken only after junior standing is reached (90 units). Upper-Division B may not be satisfied with GRC courses. Refer to online catalog for GE course selection, United States Cultural Pluralism (USCP) and Graduation Writing Requirement (GWR). USCP requirement can be satisfied by some (but not all) courses within GE categories: Upper-Division B, C1, Upper-Division C, D1, Upper-Division D, or E.
